div.p: These pages contain the metadata and tracking information for code systems that are intended to be published in the HL7 Terminology pages in the near future.

The list of systems here consists information for Code Systems that are in the process of being developed, usually for IGs, in the implementation community. This is created in order to reserve specific URIs and names that are intended to be created soon. in the HL7 Terminology pages. The information shown here is persisted and rendered from underlying NamingSystem resources.
